goals__remit: Founded in 1915, Naspers is a global internet and entertainment group and one of the largest technology investors in the world. Operating in more than 120 countries and markets with long-term growth potential, Naspers builds leading companies that empower people and enrich communities.We run some of the world's leading platforms in internet, video entertainment and media. We believe in the power of local backed by global scale and we look for opportunities to address big societal needs in markets where we see the greatest growth potential.
